title: Inception
desc: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception on a target's subconscious.

title: The Matrix
desc: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Interstellar
desc: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
desc: Batman faces his toughest challenge yet when he goes up against the Joker, a criminal mastermind.

title: Avatar
desc: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora, where he becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world.

title: Pulp Fiction
desc: The lives of two hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of bandits intertwine in this dark comedy crime film.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
desc: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Forrest Gump
desc: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

title: Fight Club
desc: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: Gladiator
desc: A betrayed Roman general fights his way back to seek revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.
